group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]Burn!

group_1.textLeft: Hmph... you take way too long to spray that fire.

group_1.textRight: Seriously, where's all of that stamina coming from...?

group_1.textLeft: It's been so long since then.
This is the place where Senpai became a witch.

group_1.narration: It's alright... @our last six months together weren't in vain... @and now I'll live on within you...
Just remember... @whenever you need help, I'll be right there with you... @alright...?
Yuna... please be safe... @My death will probably stain Futatsugi City red...

group_1.textLeft: Just as she said, my life as a Magical Girl was stained @a deep red.
And her legacy that I decided to carry on,
I can't carry it anymore.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02][se:8000_flame_01_s]Shut up already!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102400:effect_7000_attack01][surround:0001_jump01]Seyah!
It all began after I got you to start working @under me...
For all that thrashing around you did, is this really @the best you could do?

group_1.textRight: Shut up, you wannabe leader. Who the hell do you @think you are?
Juri the Great's been leading these girls for a full @year! You think you can just start bossing us @around?

group_1.textLeft: You've only been leading them with brute force and fear.
Now that Senpai's gone, I'm the one who will carry @on her legacy and give these girls some sense of @stability.

group_1.textRight: And you're using brute force to get me to fall in line. How ironic is that?

group_1.textLeft: You wouldn't listen to me otherwise, would you?

group_1.textRight: ... Heh. [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]More or less. Alright, fine. Have it your way.
But you're going to regret letting me live.
The longer I wait, the hotter my flames burn.
When I finally get another chance to fight you,
You'll be burnt to a crisp by Juri the Great's inferno.

group_1.textLeft: After that, we all started hunting down Kyubey throughout the city.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102400:effect_7002_damage01][surround:1005A01][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ugh...
Heh, that takes me back,
[se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]doesn't it!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]......!

group_1.textRight: But the more Kyubey we killed, the less witches we could find around the city.
That's only natural. Fewer Kyubey means fewer @Magical Girls, and fewer Magical Girls means fewer @witches.

group_1.textLeft: [surround:0001_jump01][chara:102400:effect_7001_attack02]And then you disappeared from my gang!

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]That's because I didn't want to just play nice and die @of hunger together!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7002_damage01][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Arrrgh!

group_1.textRight: Hahaha, it's hot isn't it...? @I want you to burn even more!

group_1.textLeft: ... And when witches disappeared from the city...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's when the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy] began.
And today's the day it ends!
Are you serious!?

group_1.textLeft: You know what caused the [textRed:Bloody Tragedy]?

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7000_attack01]The witches vanishing.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7002_damage01][se:8000_flame_01_s][bgEffect:shakeSmall]......
Correct. Then, why did they vanish?

group_1.textRight: [se:8000_flame_01_s][chara:102102:effect_7001_attack02]That's something you don't even know!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102102:effect_7003_damage02][se:8001_flame_01_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]......

group_1.textRight: How the hell are you still standing...? How are you walking like my flames are nothing to you...!?

group_1.textLeft: Because I have to take my revenge on Kamihama!
*Pant pant*

group_1.textRight: Kamihama...?

group_1.textLeft: They were the ones who took our witches away...
They were the ones who caused us to fight and @caused us to die.
It's all their fault!

group_1.textRight: Now I get it... it's them you want to kill, huh...

group_1.textLeft: So, Juri, you will become mine...
And help me with my revenge...

group_1.textRight: Hmph...
You're going to turn yourself into a witch with all of @that hate you have toward them...!
Before that happens... I'll burn you to death!
With this blazing inferno I promised you a year ago!
